revision.text: {{WikiProject Soviet Union|class=Start|importance=Mid}} {{WPMILHIST |class=Start |B-Class-1=no |B-Class-2=no |B-Class-3=no |B-Class-4=yes |B-Class-5=no |Russian-task-force=yes |WWII-task-force=yes}} ==A mistake?== As far as I know, these troops belonged to [[SMERSH]], not to internal troops of [[NKVD]]. Shoud this be fixed?[[User:Biophys|Biophys]] ([[User talk:Biophys|talk]]) 00:32, 13 March 2008 (UTC) :Yes, just need to find a source--[[User:mrg3105|mrg3105]] ([[User talk:mrg3105|comms]]) ♠♥♦♣ 06:35, 5 April 2008 (UTC) == the name the name == I really don't like the name as it is now. The task of barrier construction, as most military people understand it, is the job of the combat engineers, even in the Red/Soviet Army. There was no Arm or Service of Barrier troops, as in Cavalry troops either. I had a look at some sources, and use for these particular activities seems to be ''blocking detachments'', in the sense that they were intended to block unwanted retreat by troops. This is also the best translation from Russian--[[User:mrg3105|mrg3105]] ([[User talk:mrg3105|comms]]) ♠♥♦♣ 07:44, 5 April 2008 (UTC) == Aren't these people just the military police? == As far as I know, military police in most modern armies serve the same function. —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/68.149.159.247|68.149.159.247]] ([[User talk:68.149.159.247|talk]]) 02:59, 23 November 2009 (UTC) Except that modern military police don't indiscriminately shoot their own soldiers on purpose without a court-martial. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/146.1.1.3|146.1.1.3]] ([[User talk:146.1.1.3|talk]]) 06:53, 24 October 2012 (UTC) You're ignorant. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/80.43.130.111|80.43.130.111]] ([[User talk:80.43.130.111|talk]]) 06:13, 16 September 2013 (UTC) Barrier troops don't indiscriminately shoot their own soldiers. You must to know it, if you read russian documents. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/94.45.78.191|94.45.78.191]] ([[User talk:94.45.78.191|talk]]) 08:31, 17 August 2013 (UTC) [[User:Generalissimo Suvorov|Generalissimo Suvorov]] ([[User talk:Generalissimo Suvorov|talk]]) 21:17, 10 February 2016 (UTC)Suvorov
